author: DatLine

text: Chrono Cross. Other than the legendary Chrono Trigger soundtrack I think this is closer to my heart as my favorite OST of ALL TIME, because of the sheer fact that unlike CT's OST, which tunes into the game real well, CC's OST does that *and* also real life. Evokes realÔªø life emotion, as if the soundtrack is written to "cross dimensions" to the player(s) and back to the game world, seamlessly. Cheers.

author: bldude2

text: A masterful addition to the list. This song embodies many things that this game provokes you to think about. The apparent simplicity of home and all the things that make it that way. The nostalgia of the history of your life. The memories that are the foundation of your childhood. You never think it could change. And how would it have been without you...? This song says to not take for granted your friends, you home, your memories, and the root of your way of life.
